description:
Make your own story. User-friendly software for LLM roleplaying

RisuAI, or Risu for short, is a cross platform AI chatting software / web application with powerful features such as multiple API support, assets in the chat, regex functions and much more.
- refactor: Type language objects
- fix: add crossorigin attribute to manifest link
- chore: Remove all Capacitor-related codes
- test: Add selIdState to stores.svelte mocks
- feat: Register #escape to CBS doc, add #escape::keep
- feat: Inlay asset explorer in Playground
- chore: Remove unused visual novel mode
- fix: cbs {{#when}} ... {{:else}} ... {{/when}} works in another pure block
- chore: Remove dead settings
- fix: Exclude account information from local backups
- feat: add default value support to alertInput and related components
- fix: Hyper Memory V3 'ot' & 'startsWith' error Bug Resolve
- l10n: Languages for inlay assets explorer
- test: #each, nested #each, nested #when
- feat: other minor updates
